source.name: Treasury Recovery Act Data (September 2010)
source.description: The Department of the Treasury has significant responsibilities related to the Recovery Act. Treasury has nine programs - including several initiatives involving tax changes that will affect almost all Americans, and will deliver an estimated $150 billion of direct relief to Americans and their families.  This dataset provided a state-by-state dataset related to each of the programs.
